Posts.Content: Aug 10, 2013 04:46PM amgsc wrote: I started Xeloda with a 7/7 schedule with 4000 mg a day and then they decreased the dose to 3000 mg a day and put me on a 14/7 schedule. By the 4th day of the 14 day period, my pain went away completely. So, it only took 17 days total with 11 of them being on Xeloda. I didn't like the 14 day on and 7 day off schedule, so they allowed me to go back on the 7 day on 7 day off schedule with the lower dose.
